headerSnippet.instructions: Take a small snippet from the review.

value.body: Great experience! Received quotes from several places and this was the most reasonable and was able to come out the soonest. Will did a fantastic job and we will be calling him again next time we need our windows cleaned.

review.instructions: Use available information to create 1 testimonial in the testimonials array. Use the provided icon for all authors

example.body: The body for the testimonial goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

author.name: Name of the first person
author.source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, etc.
